alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton and northwestern Carroll Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Pea Ridge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Pea Ridge... Garfield... Gateway... Avoca... Hill Top... Walnut Hill... Busch... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 87 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
